# crypto
## 1.签到！
nc连接题目，得到n和phi，解方程即可
EXP：
```python
import math


def solve_quadratic(p_q, n):
    # 计算二次方程的根
    a = 1
    b = -p_q
    c = n
    delta = b ** 2 - 4 * a * c
    p = (-b + math.isqrt(delta)) // (2 * a)
    q = n // p
    return p, q


n = 
phi = 
p_q = n - phi + 1

p, q = solve_quadratic(p_q, n)
print("p:", p)
print("q:", q)
# H&NCTF{3013142b-4ed6-4093-8cd6-8cbbc4b61604}
```
